content.legion: Chance to recover %Max MP while attacking (10s cd)

pros:
Skill combinations allow for versatility
  • Lots of skill variety
Has a dragon that follows and attacks with you
Has utility from Return! which can provide party members Attack Speed buff
cons: Hard to master with the amount of skill combinations
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns

Knockback Resistance: +30% + (70% when Mir is attacking)
Attack Speed (Weapon): 4 (additional -1 stage when Return Dive is active)
Damage Reduction (Regular Monsters): +20% + (10% when Magic Guard is active)

For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

• Speedy Dragon Dive

extraContent.title: Fusion Skills
extraContent.content:
Fusion Skills are passive attacks that trigger whenever you combine your attack with Mir's attack. Additionally, Mir's Skills and Fusion Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed increases and will not trigger Damage Reflect.

For skills that combine with Mir's, if you cast Mana Burst before the skill or cast the skill while lying down (holding the Down Arrow Key), the MP cost will be multiplied and cost more MP

Below is a list of skills that will trigger Fusion Skills:

  • Dragon Flash (2nd Job)
    • Wind Circle (2nd Job) = Wind Slash (2nd Job)
    • Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = Thunder Flash (3rd Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Flash (2nd Job)
  • Dragon Dive (3rd Job)
    • Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = Thunder Dive (3rd Job)
    • Earth Circle (4th Job) = Earth Dive (4th Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Dive (3rd Job)
  • Dragon Breath (4th Job)
    • Earth Circle (2nd Job) = Wind Breath (4th Job)
    • Earth Circle (4th Job) = Earth Breath (4th Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Flame (4th Job)
  • Dragon Slam (5th Job)
    • Elemental Barrage (5th Job) = Wyrmking's Breath (5th Job)
    • Return! effect: Ludicrous Speed (5th Job)

primary.name: Inherited Will
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Magic ATT by 10 and All Stats by 10
details: Gained from completing Arkarium storyline/pre-quests

primary.name: Back to Nature
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Moves you to your Front Yard.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Mana Burst I
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Creates a burst of magic in front of you

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Teleport Range: 275, Downward Movement Range: +85
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage Taken (while active): -10%, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP
details: Additionally increases %Damage Reduction while active
[Note]: Always remember to have this toggled on

primary.name: Dragon Soul
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases DEF: +145, Speed: +10

primary.name: Magic Link
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Max MP: +20%, MP increases by 120 per level, Magic ATT: +20

primary.name: Dragon Spark
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance: 40%, Damage: 100%
primary.desc: Whenever you attack, Mir has a chance to deal an additional attack as well

primary.name: Mana Burst II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 5
details: Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

primary.name: Wind Circle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Knocks back up to 6 enemies, dealing 108% damage 5 times\nCasting Wind Circle after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Mana Burst before Wind Circle, or casting Wind Circle while lying down, will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 3.
primary.desc: Creates a gust of wind that pushes enemies

primary.name: Dragon Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 95%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Duration: 3.5 sec\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Mir dashes back and forth damaging enemies that pass through
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Wind Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 55%, Number of Attacks: 2, Number of Wind Blades: 3, Duration: 3.5 sec\nWhen many wind blades hit 1 enemy, final damage of wind blade is reduced by 35%
primary.desc: Mir creates blades of wind that seek and attack nearby enemies
details: Shares Skill Points with
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Return Flash
primary.shortDesc: Max Monsters Cursed: 8, amplifies Final Damage of magic attack skills by 10%, Duration 60 sec

[Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from magic attacks

primary.name: Return!
primary.shortDesc: Immediately calls Mir, mid-fight.\nCooldown: 2
primary.desc: Mir will immediately return to you if Mir is actively attacking
details: Grants a special effect depending on what skill Mir was using

primary.name: Magic Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 38, Magic ATT Speed increased by 2 for 180 sec

primary.name: Support Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, jump in mid-air to go farther.
primary.desc: Jumps upwards using Mir
details: Can be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
Automatically triggers if Mir is attacking

primary.shortDesc: While Mir is attacking, Evan's Damage: +20%\n[Passive Effect: Stance Chance +30%]

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +15%, Magic ATT: +10, Critical Rate (wand equipped): 5%

primary.name: Advanced Dragon Spark
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance: 100%, Damage: 150%

primary.name: Mana Burst III

Casting Mana Burst before Thunder Circle, or casting Thunder Circle while lying down, will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 3.

[Passive]: Increases %p Damage of , , and

primary.shortDesc: Duration: 60 sec, Attack Speed of you and nearby party members: +1

primary.name: Magic Debris

Unused magic debris will disappear over time

hyperPassive.name: Cyclone Breath

hyperActive.name: Summon Onyx Dragon

hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Elemental Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, uses magic 4 times in a row, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 6, Critical Rate: +100%
Each element increases Final Damage by 5% for 10 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
Casting Elemental Barrage after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Mana Burst before Elemental Barrage, or casting Elemental Barrage while lying down will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 5.
fifthMain.desc: Unleash an elemental attack in front of you
details: For each element you go through (4 elements) during the attack, you gain a %Final Damage buff
Attack is guaranteed Critical Hit
Casting while Mir is attacking will trigger a Fusion Skill

fifthMain.name: Dragon Slam
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Duration: 2.5 sec\nCooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: Mir dives to the ground and creates a shockwave around themselves
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Wyrmking's Breath
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 7, Duration: 4 sec

details: Shares Skill Points with and you get both skills together
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ludicrous Speed
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a damaging vortex at your location
details: Shares Skill Points with and you get both skills together
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Elemental Radiance
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, sets up a magic pentacle for 16 sec. Liberation starts when Magic ATT reaches 25, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 6 times consecutively, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%\n3 Magic ATT will be charged if a skill with an attribute hits a target, but it will only be charged once per skill. Charges 1 Magic ATT when a skill with no attribute hits a target, and there is no charge limit\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a magical pentacle that charges up as you attack enemies
details:
Using skills will charge the pentacle, granting bonus Magic Attack
  • , , can only charge the pentacle once but provides extra charges
  • can charge multiple times but does not provide as many charges
Upon reaching max charges, release a blast of elemental energy

fifthMain.name: Spiral of Mana
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 240, Duration: 7 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks :6
Upon using Mana Burst IV, reduces Spiral of Mana number of attacks by 3 for 1 sec
Cooldown: 3.75 sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +30]
fifthMain.desc: Creates (at max 1) a magic circle that fires a barrage of magic forward
details: Can be created by pressing the Down Arrow Key and together
If is used while Spiral of Mana is active, the number of hits per attack of the summon is briefly reduced
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Grants flat Magic Attack

meta: Evan is INT mage class part of the Heroes class group. What is unique about Evan is that he has a dragon that fights alongside you. Your dragon, Mir can attack on its own independant of your attacks. You can combine your attacks together to create a fusion attack
